participant_2.background:
My mind is set on things above.
I am weak and selfish , but i want to change.
My heart hurts from a broken relationship.
I hate evil.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to today?
Hello! I'm just hanging out and trying to get over a broken relationship.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What happened?
We just weren't right for each other. I'm trying to focus on myself now and make the best of it.
That's a good attitude. It's hard to be in a relationship that isn't working.
It is. But I'm learning a lot from it and I'm growing stronger.
That's good to hear. What are you doing to keep yourself busy?
I'm hanging out with friends, working out, and playing video games.
That sounds like a good way to stay busy. I'm glad you're doing things you enjoy.
Thank you. I'm trying to keep myself distracted and not dwell on the past.
That's a good idea. It's important to move on and focus on the future.
I agree. I'm excited to see what the future holds for me.
I'm sure it will be great. You seem like a strong and capable person.
No problem. I'm always here for you if you need anything.
I know. Thank you. I'm grateful to have you as a friend.
